name: Bad Sector HDD
description: Bad Sector is a game about immunizing a data storage device while a virus works against you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 and later Processor: 2.4Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Any card that supports DirectX 9 and above DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 32 MB available space Sound Card: Any modern sound card, including on-board. Additional Notes: Animations and effects can be disabled via in-game settings for older systems.

reviews.review_text: It's a bit short. It only took me 36 minutes to complete the game including all achievements. If you do like these sort of games, also take a look at fortix.
Look, I love Qix like mad, but this is some bare-bones Qix cloning going on here, and Fortix 1/2 both still exist and are dirt cheap. Those are better by a mile.
